name: Ketu Patel
title: Full Stack Developer
career_objective: A Motivated Full-Stack Developer with a solid command of the MERN stack - MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js - along with proficiency in front-end technologies like HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Tailwind CSS, and JavaScript(ES6+). Committed to delivering high-performance, scalable web applications with clean, efficient code. Enthusiastic about solving real-world problems through technology and continuously learning to stay updated with modern development practices. Seeking a challenging role where I can contribute to dynamic projects, collaborate with cross-functional teams, and grow as a versatile developer.

experience.title: Front End React Developer
summary: Frontend Development with React.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS
Reusable Component Design and UI Consistency
API Integration and State Management with React Hooks
Application Performance Optimization and Cross-Browser Compatibility
Version Control and Team Collaboration using Git

experience.title: React Developer
summary: Responsive Web Development with React.js, HTML, and CSS
UI/UX Issue Resolution and Team Collaboration

trainings_certifications.title: Responsive Web Design
trainings_certifications.summary: Learned HTML and CSS to build responsive web pages. Gained skills in Flexbox, Grid, and media queries for mobile-friendly design. Applied accessibility and semantic HTML practices. Completed projects to reinforce concepts and demonstrate practical implementation.

trainings_certifications.title: Software Testing
trainings_certifications.summary: Learned software testing fundamentals, including black-box and white-box testing. Gained skills in test case design, debugging, and defect tracking. Applied manual and automated testing techniques. Completed assignments.

projects.title: Doctor Appointment App
projects.description: Full-stack web application for hospital staff to manage patient details, appointments, and records. Includes admin login, patient forms, doctor selection, and secure data handling.

projects.title: Real Estate Website
projects.description: Web platform for browsing, searching, and filtering property listings. Includes property details, image galleries, contact forms, and responsive design.

projects.title: Figma to Responsive Website Conversion
projects.description: Converted Figma designs into responsive, pixel-perfect websites using React.js and Tailwind CSS. Focused on layout, typography, spacing, and responsiveness.

projects.title: People Management System
projects.description: React-based web app to manage people records with add, edit, delete, and view functionality.

projects.title: Banking Simple App
projects.description: Banking app with deposit, credit, loan, and FD calculations. Includes account balance tracking and transaction management.

projects.title: Travel and Tourism
projects.description: Project showcasing travel and tourism information.
